| HistoryText             = The Outcasts was a four-person group of mercenaries who worked on a variety of missions.  Each member had their own unique gift though all were experienced and hardened fighters. At an unspecified point in time, the group disbanded.

After Canada instituted the Super-Power Registration Act, [[Thomas Greaves (Earth-616)|Cleft]] caused a disturbance in [[Moosejaw]].  When Puck saw the report at [[Department H (Toronto)|Department H]], he recruited [[Kyle Gibney (Earth-616)|Wild Child]] and [[Jean-Paul Beaubier (Earth-616)|Northstar]] to assist him.{{r|Alpha Flight Vol 1 122}}

Once the three Alphans had Cleft under control [[Flagstone (Earth-616)|Flagstone]] and [[Depth Charge (Earth-616)|Depth Charge]] arrived.  During the ensuing battle, Puck conquered any doubts he had about his actions and ensured a victory. The Outcasts were taken into custody.{{r|Alpha Flight Vol 1 123}}
